description: Create 6 remaining Bullshitard pages (revolution, horror, kamaji, coffee, memo, investment) with React/TypeScript components and consistent styling
context: Examined existing page structure - uses React/TypeScript with consistent styling patterns (yellow/orange theme, white cards, shadow-lg). Read all 6 source markdown files: revolution (personal account), horror (social horror story), kamaji (technical breakthrough), coffee (transcript), memo (internal issues), investment (funding pitch).
Created React components for revolution, horror, and kamaji pages with consistent styling and structure matching existing pages.
Created React components for coffee, memo, and investment pages with consistent styling and structure. All 6 pages now complete.

Verified all 6 pages are created with consistent patterns: 'use client' directive, Next.js Link component, yellow/orange gradient background, white cards with shadow-lg, consistent typography and spacing. All pages follow the same structure as existing confession and architecture pages.
